title: ShotSpace ‚Äì Smart Screenshots
description:
üì∏ ShotSpace ‚Äì Your Screenshot Manager & Search Hub

Screenshots are memories, receipts, tickets, ideas, conversations, and proof ‚Äî but they quickly turn into chaos.  
ShotSpace turns your messy screenshot gallery into a clean, searchable, and organized space.

It‚Äôs not just a gallery.  
It‚Äôs a smart screenshot manager built to help you find anything in seconds.

üîç Find Anything Inside Your Screenshots  
Ever taken a screenshot of a payment, OTP, booking, chat, address, product, or receipt ‚Äî and later couldn‚Äôt find it?  
ShotSpace lets you search by the text inside your screenshots. Just type what you remember and it shows the right image instantly.

Type things like:  
Amazon  
‚Çπ1499  
Flight  
OTP  
Uber  

‚Ä¶and the screenshot appears.

üóÇÔ∏è Organize Without Duplicating  
ShotSpace uses a link-based folder system.  
A screenshot can belong to multiple folders without being copied, so your phone storage stays clean.

Create folders like:  
Receipts  
Travel  
Work  
Shopping  
Bank  
IDs  

and add screenshots with one tap.

üè∑Ô∏è Tags That Actually Help  
Add tags like:  
tax  
important  
refund  
client  
hotel  

Tags make filtering and searching even faster.

‚ö° Smart Suggestions  
ShotSpace scans screenshots in the background and suggests folders and tags.  
Nothing is auto-moved ‚Äî you stay in control.

üìÅ Unsorted ‚Üí Organized  
New screenshots appear in Unsorted.  
From there you can add folders, tags, or let ShotSpace suggest where it belongs.

üîé One Search for Everything  
Search across:  
‚Ä¢ Screenshot text  
‚Ä¢ Folder names  
‚Ä¢ Tag names  

and jump straight to what you need.

üé® Clean, Modern Design  
ShotSpace is designed to be calm, elegant, and visual ‚Äî built around your screenshots.

üîê 100% Private  
Everything stays on your device.  
No uploads. No tracking. No cloud.

Perfect for:  
Receipts, bills, travel tickets, bank proofs, chat messages, work notes, and anything you screenshot.

ShotSpace doesn‚Äôt just store screenshots ‚Äî it makes them useful again.
